trans-unit.target: TEXT_SUBFST026_00170_SEQ_00<tab>Bodwine is looking for an adventurer to help with a pest problem.
TEXT_SUBFST026_00170_SEQ_01<tab>The mitelings near Treespeak Stables are disconcerting the young chocobos, disrupting their training. Slay six of the vilekin and set the aspiring steeds at ease.
TEXT_SUBFST026_00170_SEQ_02<tab>You have purged the Twelveswood of six disruptive mitelings. Return to Treespeak Stables and inform Bodwine of your success.

TEXT_SUBFST026_00170_SEQ_03<tab>Thanks to your valiant efforts, the trainers can resume their work with the young chocobos. Perhaps one will serve as a famous adventurer's trusted companion someday...
TEXT_SUBFST026_00170_BODWINE_000_1<tab>If ye got a mind to make yerself useful, why don't ye cull some mitelin's fer us?
TEXT_SUBFST026_00170_BODWINE_000_2<tab>We train a lot o' chocobos here, see, and the young'uns go wild when they get a sniff of a mitelin'. Some even throw their bloomin' riders!

TEXT_SUBFST026_00170_BODWINE_000_3<tab>Let me tell ye, it ain't easy trainin' a chocobo when she drops ye on yer head every time she sees a shadow. We've been gettin' nowhere with the birds, lately. If ye could rid us of a few mitelin's, we'd be in yer debt.
TEXT_SUBFST026_00170_BODWINE_000_10<tab>Thank ye fer the help! We can finally get back to trainin' the young birds.

TEXT_SUBFST026_00170_BODWINE_000_11<tab>Chocobos're skittish by nature, see, and trainin' 'em takes a deal o' patience. It don't make the task any easier that soldiers and adventurers tend to ride 'em <var 1A 02 /var>towards<var 1A 01 /var> danger rather than away from it...
TEXT_SUBFST026_00170_BODWINE_000_12<tab>Anyroad, we're grateful fer the help. Here's a small token of our gratitude.
